name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: letmefix browser - Tab manager, Search bookmarks, Search history

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spotlight search for browser - streamlined browser extension for power users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
letmefix browser is an all-in-one browser extension to boost productivity by quick search & switch to tab, managing tabs, search bookmarks, search history, and performing various actions through a spotlight search kind of interface. 

Key Features:
- Quick and easy search with a single click or shortcut.
- Play Games to sharpen your focus and relax for regulars
- Indexed URLs for faster searching.
- Access your most visited and recently closed pages easily.
- Refresh individual or all tabs with one click.
- Search, switch, and manage tabs effortlessly.
- Duplicate tabs for better multitasking.
- Quick calculator
- Shortcuts for popular apps like notions, linear, google workspaces, figma, etc
